title: Fact Vs Fiction: Fake Pic Of Jawaharalal Nehru, Fake News About President Ram Nath Kovind
subtitle: Was the President Ram Nath Kovind snubbed at a wedding? Did Saudi Arabia behead its first female Robot Citizen? Is the Pic of Nehru with a troupe of dancers fake? Watch episode-8 Of Fact Vs Fiction...
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Was the President Ram Nath Kovind snubbed at a wedding? Did Saudi Arabia behead its first female Robot Citizen? Is the Pic of Nehru with a troupe of dancers fake?

Watch episode-8 Of Fact Vs Fiction where Suyash Barve & Jency Jacob discuss the fake news stories in the last one week and how you can spot them on social media.

In this Video we cover the following stories:

FAKE NEWS: Saudi Arabia Did Not Behead Its First Female Robot Citizen

Fake: President Kovind Was Not Snubbed At IAS Officer’s Daughter’s Wedding

Photo That Claims To Show ‘Real Face’ Of Jawaharlal Nehru Is Photoshopped
